Class model.Vehicle

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Vehicle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    model.IMovable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    model.Car, model.CarFerry

    public abstract class model.Vehicle
extends java.lang.Object
implements model.IMovable
    A representation of a high level vehicle.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      model.Vehicle(java.awt.Color color, java.lang.String modelName, double x, double y, int weight)

      • maxSpeed

        public abstract double maxSpeed()
        This abstract method returns the maximum speed of an object in any direction. This must be overriden as how a vehicle defines its maximum speed can vary greatly.
        Returns:
        maxSpeed
